title: Ashe the Soul Eater: Living as a Soldier and a Church Sister, I Work Behind the Scenes While Pretending to Be Human - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Fantasy   Mature   Mystery
tags: Appearance Different from Actual Age   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Magic   Magical Technology   Military   Modern Day   Protagonist Strong from the Start
author: 新藤悟
description:
“A corrupt soul is the most delicious.”
Lieutenant Ashe Shevelowski is the commander of the 13th guard and a sister for the holy church in the Kingdom of Helvetia. Although her outward appearance is that of a child, she is a mysterious, mythical existence known as a Soul Eater whose “work” permanently engraves itself into her body with each bloody bite she takes. Will fate remain on her side or will it be working against her?>
